description_preview: Continue with us to gain insight into the captivating life and achievements of the skilled reciter, Hani Ar Rifai.
biblio_en:
Sheikh Hani bin Abdul Rahim bin Yahya al-Rifai, the Qari and the Imam and Khatib, born in Jeddah, Saudi Arabia in the year 1394 AH (1974 AD), is married and has five children (two sons and three daughters). He is currently the imam and preacher of a mosque Anani red district of Jeddah.

Sheikh Hani Rifai grew up in a religious family cares about its members to save the Qur'an, including his parents and his brothers mercy of God adult who serves as a role model, a Mahvzh to memorize the Book of God and the old is currently only 12 years old.
biblio_fr:
Cheikh Hani bin Abdul Rahim bin Yahya al-Rifai, le Qari et l'Imam et Khatib, né à Djeddah, en Arabie Saoudite dans l'année 1394 AH (1974 AD), est marié et a cinq enfants (deux fils et trois filles). Il est actuellement l'imam et prédicateur de la mosquée Anani quartier rouge de Jeddah.

Cheikh Hani Rifai a grandi dans un membres de la famille religieux intéressés à mémoriser le Coran, y compris ses parents et ses frères merci des adultes Dieu qui servent de modèles de rôle pour lui, un Mahvzh pour mémoriser le Livre de Dieu et la vieille est actuellement âgé de 12 ans seulement.
biblio_ar:
هو الشيخ هاني بن عبد الرحيم بن يحيى الرفاعي، القارئ والإمام والخطيب، ولد بمدينة جدة بالمملكة العربية السعودية في العام 1394 هـ (1974 م )، متزوج وله خمسة أبناء (ولدان وثلاث بنات). وهو حاليا إمام وخطيب جامع العناني بحي الحمراء بجدة.

نشأ الشيخ هاني الرفاعي في أسرة متدينة يهتم أفرادها بحفظ القرآن الكريم بما في ذلك أبواه رحمهما الله وإخوته الكبار الذين كانوا بمثابة القدوة له، وهو ماحفزه على حفظ كتاب الله تعالى وعمره لايتعدى 12 سنة.

أجازه الشيخ المصري الجليل محمد بن عبد الرحيم عشيشي على رواية حفص عن عاصم ثم قرأ جزءا من القرآن على الشيخ علي جابر إمام المسجد الحرام سابقا رحمه الله، وكان قد بدأ الحفظ على يد الشيخ محمد يوسف (إمام الأمير جامع متعب).

تخرج من كلية الآداب قسم الدراسات الإسلامية بجامعة الملك عبد العزيز في جدة بتفوق، وتتلمذ فيها على يد مشايخ عظام وعلماء أفذاذ منهم الشيخ الدكتور العلامة عبد الله بن بية (في أصول الفقه) والشيخ الدكتور خلدون الأحدب (في الحديث) والشيخ الدكتور علي جابر (في الفقه المقارن)، وغيرهم.

عين الشيخ هاني الرفاعي قارئا خاصا للديوان الملكي من قبل وزارة الإعلام السعودية ثم القارئ الخاص للملك فهد بن عبد العزيز آل سعود من العام 1418 هـ إلى وفاته.

عمل معلما للدراسات الإسلامية في القسم الثانوي بالمدارس الحكومية في عدة مدن منها نجران وشرورة وينبع وجدة ، خلال الفترة من 1417 إلى 1421 هـ، وهو حاليا مدير إدارة الشؤون الشرعية بمستشفى الملك فيصل التخصصي ومركز الأبحاث في جدة، وإمام وخطيب جامع العناني بالمدينة ذاتها.

للشيخ الرفاعي حضور مكثف في مجال الإعلام، إذ شارك بتلاواته وبرامج دينية وإرشادية في عدد من وسائل الإعلام، منها قنوات "الفج" و "إقرأ" و "المجد" و "السعودية الأولى" و "الشارقة"، وإذاعة القرآن الكريم السعودية.

سجل المصحف المرتل كاملا برواية حفص عن عاصم مرتين على التوالي تلاوة صوتية، إضافة إلى العديد من الإصدارات القرآنية والخطب المنبرية. كما صدرت له عدة مؤلفات منها كتاب "شفاء العليل من القرآن الكريم" و "محكم التنزيل".
ويحتوي على الرقية الشرعية، وكتاب "الواصل القريب بين الشريعة والطبيب" ويتضمن فتاوى شرعية طبية.
biblio_html_en:
Hani Ar Rifai, born in 1974 in Jeddah, Saudi Arabia, is a distinguished figure in the Islamic world, renowned for his emotive and captivating Quranic recitations. His journey from a young enthusiast of the Quran to becoming one of the most revered Quran reciters globally is a testament to his unwavering dedication, profound spirituality, and exceptional talent. Hani Ar Rifai’s recitations are not just performances; they are deeply spiritual experiences that connect listeners to the divine, embodying the essence and beauty of Islamic teachings.

Spiritual Foundation of Hani Ar Rifai

Hani Ar-Rifai's early exposure to the Quran and Islamic teachings laid the foundation for his spiritual journey. His passion for Quranic recitation was evident from a young age, leading him to pursue formal education in the principles of Tajweed (the art of Quranic recitation) and the Islamic sciences. His commitment to mastering the art of recitation and understanding the depth of Quranic verses set him on a path toward spiritual and scholarly excellence.

Hani Ar-Rifai's unique recitation style, marked by its emotional depth and impeccable adherence to Tajweed, quickly garnered attention within his community and beyond. His ability to convey the profound messages of the Quran with such emotional resonance made his recitations widely sought after, leading to his appointment as an Imam in several prestigious mosques in Saudi Arabia, including the famous King Khalid Mosque in Jeddah. His role as an Imam further elevated his status as a reciter, allowing his soul-stirring recitations to reach a broader audience.

The advent of digital media and the internet has played a significant role in propelling Hani Ar Rifai to international acclaim. His recitations, available through various online platforms, have touched the hearts of millions around the world, transcending cultural and linguistic barriers. Ar Rifai’s global influence is a testament to the universal appeal of the Quran and the power of faith to unite people across different backgrounds and nationalities.

Beyond his recitations, Hani Ar-Rifai has made significant contributions to Islamic education and community service. He has been actively involved in teaching Tajweed and the Quranic sciences, nurturing a new generation of reciters and scholars. His work extends to humanitarian efforts, where he uses his platform to advocate for social justice and support for the underprivileged, reflecting the Quran's teachings on compassion and empathy.

Emotional and Spiritual Connection of Hani Ar-Rifai

His recitations are characterized by a deep understanding of the emotional landscape of the Quran, allowing him to express its spiritual depth through his voice. This connection is not merely about the technical perfection of his recitation but about conveying the essence of the Quran's message, making his recitations a means of reflection and spiritual growth for many.

In addition to his spiritual contributions, Hani Ar-Rifai's commitment to community upliftment and social justice reflects the holistic nature of his faith. He embodies the Quranic call to action, advocating for positive change, empathy, and unity within the ummah and beyond. His initiatives in education and humanitarian work underscore the importance of living one's faith through acts of kindness and service, reinforcing the interconnectedness of spiritual practice and social responsibility.

Hani Ar Rifai stands as a beacon of spiritual guidance and inspiration in the Islamic world. His journey from a passionate young reciter to an internationally revered figure in Quranic recitation highlights the transformative power of faith and dedication. Through his emotive recitations, Hani Ar Rifai has opened hearts to the divine message of the Quran, fostering a deeper connection to spirituality among listeners worldwide. His contributions extend beyond the realm of recitation, reflecting a life lived in service to the teachings of Islam and the well-being of the global community. As his voice continues to resonate across the world, his legacy serves as a reminder of the profound impact that faith, combined with talent and dedication, can have on individuals and societies alike, bridging divides and inspiring a collective journey towards understanding, peace, and spiritual fulfillment.

As we look to the future, Hani Ar Rifai's ongoing journey is a testament to the living, breathing essence of the Quran in guiding humanity towards moral excellence and spiritual fulfillment. His legacy, enriched by every verse he recites, continues to inspire a pathway to divine connection, encouraging individuals to delve deeper into their spiritual quest.
